name: Cyborg Invasion Shooter 3: Savior Of The World
description: Cyborg Trilogy last part. Cyborg has got new human transform. Kill different enemies, run and try to find teleport to other levels and save the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 8 Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia 900 series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: Direct x9
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: i7 Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia 1000 series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: Direct x9
